fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Reveal (Day): Reveal yourself as the Consul. For the rest of the day, you will have 3 votes. 1 use.
-Voting Fraud (Night): Block a player from being hanged the next day. If they get enough votes, the day will end without them dying. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Consul cannot be converted from a Mayor who has already revealed - a revealed Mayor is unconvertable.
